Episodes.Title: Wren Boys (1)
Episodes.Plot: The team re-investigates the death of a teenage boy who was found on a building site some years ago, drowned in concrete. Part of a human ear is found in his stomach, linking him to the dumping of another seriously injured teenager in a hospital at around the same time. The ground on which the dead teenager was found belongs to a Catholic abbey which is soon to be dissolved, and the abbey owns a shrine which might contain evidence and has to be dismantled - a task which falls to the unwilling St
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Ruairi Conaghan,  Carey  Mulligan,  Edward MacLiam,  Tony Scannell,  Gabrielle Reidy

Episodes.Title: Wren Boys (2)
Episodes.Plot: Continuing the investigation of the death of a teenager whose body was found in concrete on a building site years ago. The injured Joe McDonagh finally wakes from his coma - but how much light can he throw now on a boxing bout which went badly wrong long ago?Meanwhile, there are surprises in store for Boyd and Jordan.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Deus ex Machina (1)
Episodes.Plot: MI6 asks Boyd to reopen the case of the killing of an Iraqi dissident.Meanwhile, a man running for election as President of the Sudan announces he is going on hunger strike to protest at Britain's refusal to return the skull of a 19th century leader.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Deus ex Machina (2)
Episodes.Plot: Boyd finds a connection between the recent murder of an Iraqi and the local ruler's skull taken from the Sudan by British troops more than a hundred years before.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: The Fall (1)
Episodes.Plot: Two sexually conjoined mummies mysteriously fall through the the ceiling of an old City bank, resulting in the Cold Case team being called in to investigate.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: The Fall (2)
Episodes.Plot: As tension builds between Grace and Boyd the truth about Lisa is revealed. Meanwhile, the team have a new lead following on from Declan's death and it's a race to find the murderer before Lisa does.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Mask of Sanity (1)
Episodes.Plot: Two days after James Jenson is released from a psychiatric unit, the wallets of his victims are sent to a relative. Does this mean more murders could follow? And is James really responsible for the three coldcase murders, or did he take the blame for somebody else?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Jemma Redgrave,  Martin Marquez,  Richard Dillane,  Dominic Letts,  Toby Salaman,  Helen Blatch,  Shaun Curry,  Karen Bryson,  Jan  Carey,  Roy Holder,  Julia  Joyce,  Nicholas Beveney,  Paul Ritter,  James Fox

Episodes.Title: Mask of Sanity (2)
Episodes.Plot: The plot thickens as Rivelli and then Harris confess to the three cold case murders. Boyd remains suspicious though - who was the real murderer and what has Jensen got to do with it all?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Double Bind (1)
Episodes.Plot: A psychiatric patient, imprisoned for the murder of his parents as a teenager escapes and reveals the location of an unknown corpse.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Double Bind (2)
Episodes.Plot: The case becomes more complicated as Boyd discovers that alterative practises may have contributed to Daniel's instability.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Yahrzeit (1)
Episodes.Plot: Boyd receives an anonymous package in the post ? a Nazi ceremonial dagger. Attached to it is a Cold Case number, linking it to the unsolved murder of a young girl in May 1945. It seems that Mel had been working on the case before her death, what does this mean for the Cold Case Team?

Episodes.Title: Yahrzeit (2)
Episodes.Plot: As Ben goes missing, Boyd and his team try to force the truth out of a confused David. Boyd grows increasingly close to Sarah, and Stella travels to Poland to investigate the true story.
